description.en: Coolmath Games is a brain-training site, for everyone, where logic & thinking & math meets fun & games.
description.nl: Coolmath Games is een hersentrainingssite, voor iedereen, waar logica & denken & rekenen samenkomen met plezier & games.
description.vi_VN: CoolMathGames là trang luyện trí óc, dành cho tất cả mọi người, nơi logic & suy nghĩ & toán gặp gỡ trò chơi & vui nhộn.
